text: Ezɨ Elisa danganir Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba itimɨn ghugha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia ti ongani. Tuavir kam, ia inigh nguibar ekiar ia mangasava amimɨn mangɨghan kogham. Ezɨ markɨ, ia nan gɨn izɨtɨ kɨ ian aku gumazir ia ruir kam bagh mangam.” Ezɨ me an gɨn zuima, a men akua Samarian nguibar ekiamɨn ghu.
